sRGBToXYZ.description: sRGB to XYZ conversion matrix (D65 white point)

xyzToLab.description: XYZ to Lab conversion parameters (D65 white point)

fFunction.formula: f(t) = t^(1/3) if t > delta^3 else t/(3*delta^2) + 4/29

note: These matrices are IMMUTABLE. Any change requires new schemaVersion and new asset class. System/OS color APIs are forbidden.
